text: And they learned from their experiences. (Sweden is a good example.) What has Bernie Sanders learned? Where is the intellectual growth? What has he re thought that given the chance he would like to tell his younger self?
author: JimPethokoukis

text: Certainly you can look at the USSR and Maoist China and draw some lessons about human nature and the role of competition in a thriving economy. But Sanders has not.
author: JimPethokoukis

text: Clearly that’s not what I’m suggesting. Also, the core socialist vision of Bernie Sanders is pretty old-fashioned. It certainly has nothing to do what social market economies of Scandinavia or Switzerlan
